name: Pahtkest!
description:
Pahtkest! was developed as a small independent challenge.  I aimed to make a puzzle game without any recognizable or translatable text (including numbers).  When it turned into a highscore game, this posed a bit of an issue, hence the strange coin system for keeping track of score.  Overall I'm pretty happy with the result, and I think besides the strange scoring system the game stands well on its own despite this restriction.  I hope you agree and enjoy it!

Credits

Game by Henry Haak

Music by Abstraction (http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com);

  • Ludem Dare 30 track 4
  • Ludem Dare 30 track 7
  • Ludem Dare 38 track 9

Art by VEXED (https://v3x3d.itch.io/paper-pixels )

Additional Art by Henry Haak
